resources.string: Unable to perform selected action because permissions were not granted.
(DK)I am now %1$s in the SensibleDTU EpiGame!

(DK)You will take part in an interactive game study. The study consists of 12 rounds, each lasting one week. In each week, you may contract a hypothetical disease and become infectious for other participants. You can decide either for or against vaccination. You will receive 100 points in each round and may lose between 0 and 90 points in each round, depending on your decision and the decisions of other participants. At the end of the 12 weeks, there will be a lottery in that we raffle ??. The more points you have left at the end of the 12 weeks, the higher is your likelihood of winning a price in the lottery. Additionally, all participants with data quality better than 80% will receive movie vouchers every 2 weeks.

(DK)In each round, you can contract the disease. If you decide to vaccinate the vaccine becomes effective after 2 hours. Depending on your decision, you can be in one of three stages: 1. Susceptible: You either did not vaccinate or you vaccinated within the last 2 hours, so the vaccine is not effective yet. You can contract the disease.\n 2. Vaccinated: You vaccinated more than 2 hours ago and cannot contract the disease.\n 3. Infected: You contracted the disease. You can infect others.

(DK)At the beginning of each round you may randomly become sick (independent of your contacts with others) and become an infection seed. During the game, you can contract the disease by being in physical proximity with other persons who are infected. Only susceptible people can contract the disease. The probability of contracting the disease depends on the number of other participants who are vaccinated. The greater the number of vaccinated people, the lower the probability of contracting the disease (see the next screen). If you contract the disease, you will lose between 0 and 90 points, with an average loss of 50 points. Small losses are more likely than large losses, just like mild courses of disease are more likely than severe ones. If you are infected, you can infect other susceptible participants.

(DK)At any time, you can vaccinate against the disease. Vaccination costs a fixed amount of 10 points. Once vaccinated, the vaccine becomes effective after 2 hours and your can no longer contract the disease. The probability of side effects due to vaccination is 30%. In case of side effects, you will lose between 0 and 90 points, with an average loss of 30 points. Small losses are more likely than large losses, just like mild side effects are more likely than severe ones. If you are vaccinated, you cannot infect others. You can vaccinate at any time by opening the app. Additionally, you can check your current status - susceptible, vaccinated, or infected - in the app at any time. At the end of each round, you will learn about your points earned.
(DK)You will also receive feedback each day about the relative number of other persons you had bluetooth contact during this round, who chose to vaccinate.
(DK)You will also receive feedback each day about the relative number of all other persons playing the game, who chose to vaccinate.
(DK)Vaccination costs 10 points. It prevents from contracting the disease from 2 hours after pressing the button until the end of the round. Additional point losses due to side effects might appear.
(DK)You already made a vaccination decisions, please come back later...
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.

(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round, except for the fact that each day you will receive feedback about the number of infections, vaccine uptake and side effects among the participants you had bluetooth contact with. Additionally, you will learn about the resulting average probability of infection during that day.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.

(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round, except for the fact that each day you will receive feedback about the number of infections, vaccine uptake and side effects in the whole population of participants. Additionally, you will learn about the resulting average probability of infection during that day.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The next round starts now. The rules are the same as in the previous round.
(DK)The competition has ended. Check out the results and prizes.
(DK)%1$s of vaccinated people with side effects
(DK)Upload your data on time to get more accurate feedback.
(DK)SensibleDTU EpiGame: You are %1$s and lost %2$s points!
